page.title: 01Mattersey School
page.content: Situated in Thorpe Rd, the present school ws built in 1963 to take the place of the old schools in Mattersey and Mattersey Thorpe. The school comprises two buildings. The main building houses two classrooms, kitchen, staffroom, Head's office, large hall and usual facilities. The smaller annex was built later and comprises classrooms linked by a craft area, cloakroom and washing facilities. At the present time there is a headteacher, 1 full time and 2 part time members of staff caring for 51 children. There is also a secretary, 1 cook and 2 assistants, 1 caretaker and 1 diner lady. The school caters for children from 4+ to 11+. It also has a mother and toddler group which operates on Tuesday afternoons with a present membership of 15 toddlers.
